evidence.text: Person B: Ivan is not your husband and you are not part of this family and your Russian is embarrassing.
Person B: Vanya is not in love with you. And we will not accept this.

Person A: Vanya.
Person B: Shut her up. And Toros, we will be discussing your future of lack of one with the company. You let him trot off to Vegas, my god. Hurry!

Person A: You're getting on that plane and getting a divorce.
Person B: Oh, I'll be getting a divorce. Sure. But I'm getting a lawyer, suing Ivan and your family and I'll walk away with half. We don't have a pre-nup.

Person A: Do that and you lose everything. Any money you may have, although I doubt you have any, will be gone. You have a house? A car? All gone.Your life and the lives of your family and friends will be destroyed. If you doubt I can do that, please go ahead, see what happens.

Person A: Because your son's a pussy.
Person B: And you are a disgusting hooker.
Person A: And your son hates you so much that he married one to piss you off. Your family is trash.
Person A: Take a last look `cause this is the best you'll ever get, bitch.
Person B: Wait, is that my scarf?
